attributes.action: PAY Haemophiliacs a decent payout, humanity 1st
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You must make a substancial payout to these people, I cannot believe that they are treated like scroungers, on socuial security and gave to go through routes to get anything, this is not human rights, its cruelty, they have all had different payouts throught he years, it doesnt matter if 1 is already a millionaire, they all have same infection caused by others and by others who didnt do job properly...At least IRELAND know how to treat people properly. why couldnt you have paid out say £500,000 each haemophiliac and you know they and families would of been so happy and secure, no no you let it drag on and on, while many die away, and then you were going to double their monthly payments, that soon dropped to a miserly £30 or was it £60 extra a month, how cruel you are, im just a voter like many others that cant see you being fair at anything you do, or maybe abroad treated better than home..
What sort of people are you...I will carry this on through the internet and see what response I can get from 1000,s You give billions to banks but cant settle haemophiliacs that have done NO WRONG AT ALL..only to have treatment that ended up as death threat...

regards

1 Angry Voter

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
